name: Mini Coup de Coeur pin brooch in silver
description:
The second time I saw my boyfriend I felt lightening go through my legs...'Coup de Coeur' is a french expression for when someone falls instantly in love for something or someone at first sight! It's much stronger in french then it is in English as the 'coup' is translated literally as 'blow' or 'shock', and 'coeur' is simply one's heart.

Read about it's journey in my Blog: minicyn.blogspot.fr

This little 3D heart/love brooch is hand fabricated from 2 droplet shape, made from SOLID square silver wire. One drop is soldered vertically against the other which lies flat against one's fabric. When it's viewed on one angle it looks first like a droplet but take another look...it's heart.

The size of the brooch is small to recreate the special and preciousness of our love. Please check the size; 1.7cm deep measured at it's longest and 1.5cm wide(as a whole at it's wides).

The pin at the back is made this way so it attaches securely, unlike pins where it does on occasion falls off by itself. These were handmade by minicyn.

Thank you for your visit! Postage for this item is set automatically as Registered mail.
All orders comes nicely gift wrapped in a box.

name: Light salmon colored Moonstone solid silver ball necklace
description:
My inspiration for this comes from a mixture of modernist and minimalist jewelry.
NOTE: This listing is for a ready-made necklace what you see is what you'll receive in the pictures.

This is a long luxurious necklace of 31inches / 79cm long. If you have a thin neck it can be worn twice around, showing both the ball and little nuggets that lies along the chain!

Moonstone comes in various natural colors, and this one is in light salmon with it's inherent opalescent(cat's eye) quality clearly visible. Hand-set by me from sterling silver into a ball-like fashion. The chain goes right through the pendant and thus it moves along the chain as you move. 2 sets of double nuggets/dumbbells are set along the chain.

Cute little perforated bubbly pattern holes can be seen at the back of the pendant(see pics for more details). Lastly, near the clasp I've added a hand-twisted prong accompanied by a droplet companion charm marked with a floral motif from a vintage steel stamp.

Everything is hand fabricated by me from scratch from ecological environmentally friendly silver(except for the chain) from my atelier in Paris, France.

Measurements:
• The width of the ball is roughly 1.65cm wide & 1.4cm deep
• droplet disc charm is 1.1cm long x 0.7cm wide
• chain is 31inches long
• hand-twisted prong is 3cm long.

Thank you for your visit!

name: Chardon scottish thistle silver pendant with brown rose cut diamond necklace
description:
These Historical collection are inspired by my love for antiques... giving them new life and most of all sharing! NOTE: what you see is what you'll receive, please check the measurements before you check out it's important.

A new member to the Historical collection, where pieces of jewelry are simulated from part's of antique to wearable objects, never destroying the original. In this case a small female belt buckle as shown in the montage image. I'm not 100% sure but the origin may be Scottish with the thistle clearly present! In the past nurses had buckles with this very similar style.

Part of the process is through lost wax casting, taking only a small certain part of the original piece through lost wax casting, clumsily on purpose so small fragments of the details are missing... like treasures found by anthropologists. But I've shined up parts as well untouched.

I've adding a little small brown rose cut diamond flush set into 14 karat solid gold ball, as shown on the pictures.

M e a s u r e m e n t s:
• width of the pendant at the widest is about 2.5cm
• the chain has flexibility of 2 lengths 16.5 and 19 inches
• thickest part of the pendant is about 2.2mm
• diamond is rose cut 1.8mm wide in light brown flush set into a 14 karat solid gold ball 2.5mm.

Thank you for your visit!

name: Victorian Floral ring band
description:
This is for a size US 7, British O and French 55 1/4,

Because of the design of the ring it can be adjusted a little to accommodate a little. As you can see from the pictures that it is not entirely linked all around. I just love the roundness of each end which also can be worn at the front as a feature!

Note: What you see is an example but I do endeavor to fabricate as close and true as what is shown - Flower and leaves will be present as pictured, finishing included!

One of many manifestations from the Minicyn Victorian floral collection. This inspiration comes from my love for the antiquity; preserving it and passing/sharing the love of history.

This hand-fabricated ring's impression is simulated from an antique Victorian knife's engraving through lost wax casting into solid silver. The floral relief has been oxidized then finished with a slight polish once over to enhanced it's hypnotizing beauty.

name: Minicyn Victorian Floral Arch ring
description:
This is a custom order size ring for up to US size 7.5, any larger sizes please contact me for more details.

Hand-made entirely of solid sterling silver, this uniquely organic ring's impression is simulated from an antique Victorian knife's engraving (see last pic)through lost wax casting into solid silver. The floral relief has been oxidized then finished with a slight polish once over to enhanced it's hypnotizing beauty.

Some lovely distressed texture has been added around the outside surface of the band of the ring, which is nicely contrasted by the structural shape of the ring. The insides have been polished to high shine for ease of wear. This ring applies to both sexes!

NOTE: Postage includes Registered mail. Orders will come nicely gift wrapped in a box.

name: Ruby Star faceted solid silver ring
description:
Ruby this Ruby that...yes she's a star. A unique and one-of-a-kind star set in a size US 6 though I can re-size it to US 6.5 too.

These are one of a few Ruby stars I found amongst my many travels, and this particular one has it's own unique stripes and story to tell. It's full-bodied and rounded at the top, juxtaposed and surrounded by faceted solid silver. Hand-carved by Minicyn in wax and cast in solid silver in a little foundry in Paris, France.

The insides have been polished to smoothness to ease one's wear. On the plus plus side the bottom side of the and is narrow...so that means it's super comfy to wear.

The widest part of the ring is 0.85cm and the narrowest part is 2.2cm. Thank you for visiting Minicyn!

name: Slick minimalist Minicyn knuckle duster
description:
Besides being super comfy to wear, this ring is hand-made from environmentally friendly silver from my little workshop in Paris! It's ready made in size US 7.5 for both fingers, but I can enlarge if you want it bigger. For anything other than that please ask for a custom listing I won't bite!

The finish is polished all around the sides and insides, and in matt shiny the rest...I love combining the two to contrast. But if you prefer it to all be polished I can do that too just leave a 'note to seller' when you check out. I've left one top corner of this Minimalist slick ring rounded and the other with it's corner for aesthetic reasons. Funny thing is that it looks little like a bubble speech too!

name: Mini faceted droplet dangle silver earrings
description:
These are small and dainty everyday wear with subtle hints of silver shiny sparkle in textured polished finish. Demure, subtle and comfortable to boot.

The finish on the droplet is textured polished, and the ear-wires are finished in polished shine!

Completely hand-fabricated by me from my little workshop, they're made of pure silver individually hand-crafted in a droplet shape. You will receive a completely new pair just not the one pictured but just as gorgeous I assure you. The toal length of the earrings are about 2.3cm long(ear-wires included).

This order comes nicely gift wrapped in a box and sent via Standard priority postage which does not include tracking number or insurance. If a second item is purchase along with this you'll be automatically upgraded to Registered post.

name: Tubular rose cut light grey/gray diamond silver ring
description:
This is a shorter(tube) version then the other I have available!
Simple, stylish and elegant, this ring is inspired by my love for the Modernist era, and I love the slight sense of humor in it's posture! Set on a band that's round on the outside and flat on the inside, that makes it ultra comfortable! Great ring to stack with other pieces you may have... see my pics for ideas.

This listing is for one ring only - the tubular ring. Other rings featured with it are not included.

NOTE: This listing is for a ready-made piece that's ready to ship in size is US 6.5, British N and French 54 – I can enlarge it a little up to US 7.5 just leave a note to me when you checkout. If you'd like one custom made for you can send me a note too!

This rather gorgeous sparkly rose cut diamond in color medium grey/gray is set in a medium length solid silver tube soldered onto a half round silver band making it super comfy to wear! Half round bands are wires that are round on the outside and flat on the inside.

m e a s u r e m e n t s:
• Tube neck is 2.5mm high, the width of the tube is about 2.9mm wide
• this is a ready-made ring in size US 6.5, British N and French 54
• handmade in solid sterling silver 925(environmentally friendly silver sourced from a Paris foundry).

Thank you for visiting Minicyn!

name: Singular rolling Oh silver necklace
description:
Stylised, demure, contemporary and kinetic to boot!

Hand made out if 950 environmentally conflict-free solid sterling silver, this 'Oh' pendant is made in a way so it can roll along the chain as you move.

Completely hand-fabricated out of square solid sterling silver, it has been forged for strength. The solid sterling silver chain is 15.5inches long and width of pendant circle is 3cm. If you'd like a longer chain please drop a note when you check out.

For a double 'O' version check out: http://www.etsy.com/listing/65908996/medium-double-rolling-oh-silver-necklace

All orders comes nicely gift wrapped in a box and sent via Standard postage which does not include tracking number or insurance.

name: Tiny black diamonds in rose gold diamond studs earrings
description:
These 1mm Chakri black diamonds in are superbly small and gorgeous!

I'd decided to set them into 14karat ROSE GOLD for that lovely contrast.The cut of the diamond is 'Rose cut' of AAA 1st Grade. Chakri diamonds are flakes of diamond, which is know to be the hardest mineral on Earth and is highly prized.

The total width of the rose gold ball is about 2.5mm wide and 1.5mm deep. The finish is satin against the shiny black diamonds.The posts are also in rose gold, BUT I'm not including rose gold earnuts just solid sterling silver ones.

Thank you for your visit!

NOTE: Postage includes Registered mail(with insurance) it does not come with ONLINE tracking. Thanks for visiting my little shop. All orders comes nicely gift wrapped in a box.

name: Rolling Oh and Omm silver necklace
description:
Simple, minimalist and classical to boot! They so cute it breaks my little achy break-y heart when I have them in my hand... they're truly adorable. You'll receive one just as lovely as the one pictured.

Made of solid sterling silver, these 2 separate pendants are hand fabricated from 1mm thick square wire and cut from a sheet of solid silver. They sit along the chain quietly so it rolls along the as you move!

Measurements:
The length of chain is at 16.5inches. Big circle pendant's outside diameter is about 2cm and the disc is smaller one is 1.1cm wide. Every component is hand-fabricate from environmentally conflict free silver except for the clasp!

Thank you for visiting Minicyn!

name: Classical pebble pendant with Rose Cut diamond and golden fronds
description:
This three piece ensemble is indeed charming, unique, dainty and demure. Inspired by nature and also made of environmentally friendly solid silver! You'll receive one just as similar as this sample pictured.

I've always loved Rose cut diamonds but now they're back in fashion hence these stones are readily more available, so here we are! In fact, various forms of rose cut have been around since the mid 16th cent. usually for diamonds. A basic rose cut has a flat base like this one with great clarity (no pavilion) and a crown composed of triangular facets in symmetrical arrangement, which rise to form a point like this.

The diamond feature pendant is also accompanied by 2 dainty charms; one with 3 fronds – 2 which are made of solid 14kt gold/rose gold and one other of solid silver. And lastly a silver disc charm hand-stamped using a french vintage steel stamp from my antique tool collection.

The feature pendant itself has a shiny finish with some tiny specks of texture reminiscent of the wear and tear of nature's ups and down's – also reflecting light at the same time giving you the impression of sparkles. Another unique feature is near the clasp – a hand-twisted wand which makes clasping blindly much easier, see montage pic for details..

Measurements:
• width of pendant with white diamond is roughly 5.5mm, diamond itself is about 2.3mm
• leaf charm is roughly 0.5cm
• length of solid silver chain 16.5inch long.

name: Mystical orient leaf earrings with drops of 14kt gold
description:
Simple, classic everyday wear. These are textured small rounded square studs in silvery white solid sterling silver, garnished with dots of solid 14kt gold and hand stamped with unique Minicyn patterns. Part of my new Mystical Orient collection.This is a pair of earrings that is and will forever be a timeless classic, with a the subtlety of the Mystical Orient.

Made from environmentally conflict-free sterling silver sourced from Paris, France foundry. The total length of each earring is about 0.7-.0.8cm wide – Finish is brushed shiny on the surface, accented with a polished golden dot.

Each pair is handmade individually so there may be slight differences to the one you will receive to the one you see, but each will be equally lovely!

Postage includes Registered mail and all orders will come nicely gift wrapped in a box. Thank you for visiting Minicyn.

name: Simple floral dot earrings
description:
These are pretty, simple and timeless everyday wear.

These are hand-sawed and stamped by Minicyn out of a sheet of solid reclaimed 950 sterling silver. 

The finish surface of the round discs are matt-satin with it's sides burnished to shine. The width of the discs are about 0.9cm wide. Twisted wires are used for the ear wires which are soldered onto the discs.

Made from environmentally friendly sterling silver sourced from Paris, France foundry. Postage includes Registered mail. Orders will come nicely gift wrapped in a box.

name: Sequins galore ring
description:
This is a one-of-a-kind ring strictly hand-fabricated by Minicyn.
Ring band fits US 7 3/4, British P 1/2, diameter 17.97mm

Unique and flirtatious, this is a definite going out ring that can be worn on it's own or layered with other pieces. The discs are made to be worn down-wards since we spend most of our times with our hands down...but the sequins are able to flip back wards...designed to do so!

Both the discs were hand-sawed and the band was hand-twisted out of solid silver straight from her little atelier in Paris. One of the disc is accented with a solid 14karat yellow gold as you can see in the pics.

There are 4 discs attached to a jump-ring that's soldered onto the ring band. They move and fall as you move making small gentle coin like music.The finish on the ring is polish.

Measurements:
• widest disc 1.9cm and the smallest 0.8cm
• band thickness is made up of two 0.8mm round wire.

Thanks for visiting my little shop. All orders will come nicely gift wrapped in a box. Postage includes Registered mail.

name: Falling petals bar earrings in 22karat gold and silver
description:
The warmth gold is reminiscent of the warmth in Spring.
I have one pair left.

These studs are made of bi-metal - two layers of metal one on top of each other in solid silver and 22 karat gold. I've marked the gold surface with one of my vintage steel stamps sourced from vintage market around Paris.

Gold is lovely when it's done in small quantity. This simple modern shaped studs are juxtaposed with organic motif randomly placed like falling leaves.

The length is 8mm long.

Made from environmentally friendly sterling silver sourced from Paris, France foundry. Postage includes Registered mail. Orders will come nicely gift wrapped in a box.

name: Oval Mystic Orient solid silver ring with a drops of gold
description:
This listing is for a size US size 6.5, French 54and British N.

This gorgeous statement ring was handmade from scratch from a sheet of solid sterling silver by me from my Paris atelier. The pattern you see above were hand-stamped individually with multiple different vintage french steel stamps to make up this pattern...I then garnished it with 2 solid 14karat gold balls.

The ring band is quite special as two twisted wire ring is used instead with little ball of solid silver at the end where they meet. It is entirely made of environmentally conflict-free sterling silver sourced from Paris, France.

Measurements:
• The oval depth is 2.9cm and 1.5cm wide
• Finish is in shiny matt and golden dots of 14karat are polished

name: Orchid silver coin necklace
description:
Inspired by Minicyn's love for Orchids.

These two dainty and elegant solid silver coin-like pendants are individually hand fabricated, with original detailed impressions made from vintage french steel stamps. The featured motif is reminiscent of an orchid flower - one of my favorite of all flowers. And accompanied by one other simple flower dot.

Both the pendants hang and glide smoothly along an 16inch long chain, accompanied by beautiful twisted prong. The bigger coin of 1.5cm wide is garnished with a dot of solid 14kt gold for color contrast. And the other daintier coin is a little companion in life, jiggling and jangling together as you move.

Both pendants have a matt-satin finish, made of environmentally conflict-free solid 950 sterling silver sourced from Paris, France. 

Thanks for visiting my little shop. All orders will come nicely gift wrapped in a box. Postage includes Registered mail.

name: Slicker then ever Minicyn studded knuckle duster
description:
Streamlined, slick, edgy. 
This is for a size US 7.5 on one finger and 7 on the other. If you'd like a custom listing please contact Minicyn.

Hand-carved by MInicyn from wax and cast into solid sterling silver.
The spikes are not violently sharp as it is after all a piece of jewelry made purely for adornment and not to harm.

The finish on the inside is polish for ease and comfort of wear, outside surface is polished-matt.

Thanks for visiting my little shop. All orders will come nicely gift wrapped in a box. Postage includes Registered mail.

name: Toi et Moi ring
description:
You and me, toi et moi.
These two dainty ring is a made-to-order listing(for sizes up to US 7), please leave a note of your size when you check out and up to 2 days to fabricate it before shipping. If you'd like anything larger then size US 7 please pop me a note!

Just the perfect combination... this ring is made of 2 rings put together; one plain solid silver ring accented with a solid 14karat gold and the other and twisted solid 14karat gold band. They're held together with a small jump-ring that has a small disc charm attached to it. The disc is marked on one side the sterling silver '925' and Minicyn's official french jeweler's registration in a lozenge shape.

Simply delicate, dainty and classical. A great everyday wear ring that's ultra comfy you won't even know it's there, makes a great additional stacking ring too.

name: Mystical Orient Amulet on silk cord
description:
Part of the Mystical Orient collection.
Amulets are usually known to be an ornament or a small piece of jewelry thought to give protection against evil, danger or disease. This was made with strong thoughts of protection for our beautiful nature instead. 95% of the silver I use are reclaimed/conflict free silver, not freshly mined from our vulnerable earth sourced from a Paris foundry.

These pendants are hand-sawed and hand-stamped with vintage steel stamps onto a sheet of solid sterling silver of palms, elephant foot prints, birds; sun beam, waves and flowers.

Accented in the center is a solid 14karat gold ball, giving it a little hint of color contrast which I love and is somewhat appropriate for the orient.

Thanks for visiting my little shop. All orders will come nicely gift wrapped in a box. Postage includes Registered mail.

name: Mini facets earrings
description:
Mini facets diamond-like sterling silver studs.

These are small little perfect everyday wear with subtle hints of solid sterling silver sparkle. The finish on them is rough polished, please look at pics for more details.
But so delicate and charming, so quietly gorgeous I cannot seem to show off it's full glory in these pictures. Please note that these are made individually handmade by Minicyn.

Measurements:
• facet width is roughly 5mm
• all made of solid silver(sterling).

Thanks for visiting my little shop. All orders will come nicely gift wrapped in a box. Postage includes Registered mail.
